title: Dr. Alban - One Love (The Album) (1992)@flac
description:
"One Love (The Album)" is very dance orientated, however it includes Dennis Pop's ace pioneering and Dr. Alban's down-to-earth yet slightly tacky rap lyrics. The album has some sort of African/North European dance music culture vibes which means 90's dance music meets African drums and rhythm. 
There are some slower tracks but they are mostly relaxing rather than being boring. The lyrics are also political. On "Roll Down Di Rubber Man" Dr. Alban recommends the people to wear a condom before having sexual intercourse. Very educational message, to be honest.
"One Love" (the album) might not be the best album around but it surely works on the dance floor. (rateyourmusic)
